hero_heading: Create a job-ready resume for free in minutes.
hero_subheading: Creating an ATS-friendly tech resume that follows best practices and impresses hiring managers has never been easier.

about_description_1: I think it should be easy for candidates to build comprehensive resumes for free. That's what resumebuilder.dev does best.
about_description_2: I founded resumebuilder with the goal of building the first completely free platform for job seekers, and the mission to empower every candidate.
about_description_3: When I do that, more candidates will land their dream job and more companies will hire top tier talent.
about_description_4: I am unifying the entire workflow of job seeking, so candidates can go from building resume to applying in no time, and hiring managers and recruiters can connect anywhere, anytime.
about_description_5: And I am building an ecosystem where anyone can contribute with templates, suggest ideas and publish stories.
about_description_6: Resumebuilder was started in 2021 by myself out of passion for creating well-crafted and delightful to use products.
import_from_linkedin_description: The easiest and fastest way to obtain a copy of your LinkedIn data is to initiate a data download from your <2>{{link}}</2> page:

import_from_linkedin_list_item_2: Select the data that you're looking for and <2>{{bold}}</2>.
